name: netlamtk
short_description: Netlamtk is a comprensive firewall based in iptables and daemons, the used it\'s orientated for desktop machines and/or more. Easy operations, a lot of info in all the stages,\"supershell\"or simple dialogs.You can learn about iptables and your system.
